    protected Player
    CalculatorTeacherOwnership.getNewPlayerOwnerOfTeacherOfColor(Teacher t)

    protected void
    CalculatorTeacherOwnership.normalOwnershipCondition(Player oldOwner, Teacher teacher)
    Teacher ownership condition for a player: highest number of students on the teacher's color dining table if old owner still has the teacher ownership condition, keep the teacher on its school If another player has teacher ownership condition, move teacher from old owner's school to new owner school
